number.desc:
Only used when Easing is selected.
The actor will move at least at this speed. The actual speed depends on the distance to the target. The maximum speed is Minimum Easing Speed plus Speed. The actor will move at maximum speed if it is in the opposite diagonal corner of the target.
number.name: _MinimumEasingSpeed

number.desc: The speed to move towards the target.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The actor will not move closer to the target than this value.
number.name: _Margin

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move faster if farther away from the target and slower if closer to to the target.
If unselected, the actor will move towards the target at a constant speed as specified in the Speed attribute.
boolean.name: _Easing

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will stop moving when colliding with the target actor.
If unselected, the actor will instead continue to and push the target around.
boolean.name: _StopwhenColliding

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to be dragged and dropped by the mouse.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to be dragged and dropped by the mouse.
snippet.name: Drag and Drop

boolean.desc: If selected the actor cannot be dragged off screen.
boolean.name: _CannotExitScreen

list.desc: List of random sounds to play
list.name: _sfxlist

snippet.desc: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Cannot Exit Screen

snippet.desc: Make the actor follow a given actor.
snippet.description: Make the actor follow a given actor.
snippet.name: powerUp_sucker

actor.desc:
The target actor this actor will follow.
If the target actor is unset or dead this behavior will do nothing.
actor.name: _TargetActor

number.desc: The speed to move towards the target.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The actor will not move closer to the target than this value.
number.name: _Margin

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move faster if farther away from the target and slower if closer to to the target.
If unselected, the actor will move towards the target at a constant speed as specified in the Speed attribute.
boolean.name: _Easing

number.desc:
Only used when Easing is selected.
The actor will move at least at this speed. The actual speed depends on the distance to the target. The maximum speed is Minimum Easing Speed plus Speed. The actor will move at maximum speed if it is in the opposite diagonal corner of the target.
number.name: _MinimumEasingSpeed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will stop moving when colliding with the target actor.
If unselected, the actor will instead continue to and push the target around.
boolean.name: _StopwhenColliding

snippet.desc: Attach this behaviour to an actor to have it fade out after the specified time and over a specified duration
snippet.description: Attach this behaviour to an actor to have it fade out after the specified time and over a specified duration
snippet.name: Fade After Time

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds, over which to fade out.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds after which the actor should start fading.
number.name: _TimetoFadeAfter

boolean.desc: An INTERNAL attribute to determine whether or not the actor is already fading.
boolean.name: _Fading

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor is killed after fading out.
boolean.name: _KillAfterFade

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to be dragged and dropped by the mouse.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to be dragged and dropped by the mouse.
snippet.name: recycling_trashBehavior

boolean.desc: If selected the actor cannot be dragged off screen.
boolean.name: _CannotExitScreen

snippet.desc: A template for a button with animations for normal, pressed and hover states.
snippet.description: A template for a button with animations for normal, pressed and hover states.
snippet.name: Three State Button

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an unpressed state.
animation.name: _NormalAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an pressed-down state.
animation.name: _PressedAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in a focused state. Not used in mobile games.
animation.name: _HoverAnimation

text.desc: A message to send to all behaviors of this actor when the button is released.
text.name: _Message
